page.title: 15Grandfather's home-life
page.content: Patrick Joseph Mullarkey was born in 1922. He gets up at 6.00 and takes his tablets with grapefruit juice.He suffers from osteoarthritis.The doctor says he has to do slight exercises and swimming. After breakfast he reads the mail.One of his hobbies is gardening. He grows tomatoes.He potters round the garden where he grows flowers like lupins,chrysanthemums,dahlias and lots of other flowers.He also looks after his grand-daughter Lora because her mother and father work full-time. Then my grandmother Agnes Mullarkey comes home and he gives her her dinner which he has already prepared.In the afternoon he will watch racing on television or go on some errands or goes visiting. After tea he watches television and goes to St. Bernard's club and then goes to bed.
